item.description:
This is the 7th anniversary since the greatest crime of our history that is still without a real investigation. If possible meet at 5pm to help distribute flyers.

6:00 PM- Improbable Collapse: The Demolition of Our Republic (Film running time - 69 minutes)

Valley 9/11 Truth will meet after film to discuss actions and events for this coming year.

8:00 PM - ZERO, an investigation into the events of 9/11
Italian film shown in European Parliament 26 February 2008,
ZERO will also broadcast on Russian Television on 9/12, 2008
and will screen in Noho-9/11 with following discussion. (film running time - 110 minutes.)


Consider this critical anniversary with
eyes wide open


Hundreds architects & engineers call for new investigations
AE911truth.org

Thousands of NYC voters call for independent investigations
NYC911initiative.org

For more on campaigns and resources, see: Flyby News

Bush and 9/11 Investigative Reports,
looking into the unanswered questions.
item.how_to_find_us: You'll find us in the room in back of the Woodstar Cafe.
item.name: 11 September 2008 & Valley 9/11 Truth
